alert.note: Alert for Central Interior (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 06 at 11:37AM AKST until February 06 at 4:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility. Winds gusting to 40 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Over Elliot Highway Summits. * WHEN...Until 4 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Drifting snow will make travel difficult. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds should decrease this afternoon and conditions slowly improve in the afternoon.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
